sentences.en: "Get the guy in the purple shirt." — "All right, my man."
sentences.cn: “把那个穿紫衬衫的家伙叫过来。”——“好的，老兄。”

sentences.en: a check shirt
sentences.cn: 格子衬衫

sentences.en: Because it was warm, David wore only a white cotton shirt.
sentences.cn: 因为天气暖和，戴维只穿了一件白色的棉衬衣。

sentences.en: He fled wearing only a sarong and a tattered shirt.
sentences.cn: 他逃走时只穿着莎笼和破旧的衬衫。

sentences.en: He had bare feet, a T-shirt and cords on.
sentences.cn: 他光着脚，穿着T恤衫和灯芯绒裤子。

sentences.en: He was wearing a light-grey suit over a shirt.
sentences.cn: 他在衬衫外面套了一件浅灰色西装。

sentences.en: He was wearing a stripy shirt and baggy blue trousers.
sentences.cn: 他身着一件条纹衬衫和一条宽松的蓝裤子。

sentences.en: He was wearing cotton pants and an open-necked shirt.
sentences.cn: 他穿着纯棉裤子和开领衬衫。

sentences.en: He wore a plain blue shirt, open at the collar.
sentences.cn: 他穿一件素净的蓝色衬衫，领口敞着。

sentences.en: I have to wear a shirt and tie to work.
sentences.cn: 我上班要穿衬衫打领带。

sentences.en: I undid the bottom two buttons of my yellow and grey shirt.
sentences.cn: 我解开了自己黄灰相间的衬衫上最下面的两个纽扣。

sentences.en: I went to Brooks Brothers and bought myself a decent shirt.
sentences.cn: 我去布鲁克斯兄弟专卖店给自己买了一件体面的衬衫。

sentences.en: In a pinstriped suit he instantly looked like a stuffed shirt.
sentences.cn: 穿上一套细条纹西装后，他马上就显得一本正经起来。

sentences.en: Johnson was clad casually in slacks and a light blue golf shirt.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊身穿休闲宽松的长裤，配以淡蓝色高尔夫衬衫。

sentences.en: She wore a checked shirt tied in a knot above the navel.
sentences.cn: 她身穿一件格子衬衫，衣角在肚脐上方打了个结。

sentences.en: The only thing those swindlers didn't take was the shirt off my back.
sentences.cn: 那些骗子唯一没有拿走的就是我这条命

sentences.en: The plane doesn't land for another hour, so keep your shirt on.
sentences.cn: 飞机还要过一小时才着陆，所以请保持耐心

sentences.en: The shirt's cuffs won't sag and lose their shape after washing.
sentences.cn: 这件衬衫的袖口洗后照样挺括，不变形。

sentences.en: The young man slipped on the shirt and buttoned it up.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻人一下子穿上衬衫，扣好了扣子。

sentences.en: they'll confirm it's him, I'll put my shirt on it.
sentences.cn: 他们确认是他，我完全相信。
